author: protolambda
content: PSA: We're moving the 1-day devnet plans by at least a few days. The plan was Mon setup & Tue launch, but we could move it to Thu setup & Fri launch (and stop again before the weekend). Me, the Prysm team, and others here had to react to a recent incident on mainnet eth2, so we need more time for devnet preparation.

author: protolambda
content:
```
| PT (-7)    | UTC                | CET (+2)  | AEST  (+10) |
| 10:00 Mon  | 17:00 Mon April 26 | 19:00 Mon | 03:00 Tue   |
| 02:00 Fri  | 09:00 Fri April 30 | 11:00 Fri | 19:00 Fri   |
```
Reminder, office hours same time as last week.

author: lekevicius
content:
> If you are into UI design

is UI help still needed for Rayonism?

author: schone_wizard
content: Iâ€™d like to know that too actually

author: protolambda
content: One example is to make a faucet website for later testnet use, but that thing has already been implemented (https://github.com/rauljordan/eth-faucet).

author: protolambda
content: There may also be other types of website tooling. The same part on the rayonism.io site also mentions data analysis. Any kind of visualization of data that helps us understand the testnets better is helpful. Anyway, the point is that if you feel motivated, but not a protocol dev, you can still help.
